availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Isaac Wingate, Sr. (Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer. Delaware native. Married to Jane M. Wingate. Father of Lavinia Wingate, Susan Wingate, Isaac Wingate, Jr., and Louisa Wingate. Farmer in Franklin County in 1850 and 1860. Owned fourteen enslaved persons in 1850.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 1, p. 16. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 1. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 1, p. 7. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Forks of Elkhorn, p. 17. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records â€“ Microfilm (1852-1910), Ancestry, Deaths, Franklin County, Kentucky, 1876.
